borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
The proposed development, by reason of siting, scale and
design, would result in the loss of outlook, daylight and sunlight and an enclosing effect to
neighbouring occupiers, to the extent that this would constitute undue harm to
residential amenity. The proposal is therefore found to be at odds with the
following policies which seek to ensure that development proposals adequately
protect residential amenity:


 National Planning Policy Framework (December 2023)
 Part D of Policy D6 of the London Plan (March 2021)
 Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development
     Framework Borough Wide Development Plan Document (March 2011)
 Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary
     Planning Document (February 2012)
 Policies DMD1 and DMD6 of The London Borough of
     Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission
     Version, December 2021)
The proposed development, by reason of siting, scale, mass
and design, would be an overly bulky addition which would fail to
appear subordinate and sympathetic to the original dwelling and would constitute overdevelopment in combination with the existing extensions. This would cause harm to
the character and appearance of the original dwelling and surrounding area. The
proposal is therefore found to be at odds with the following policies which
seek to ensure that development proposals have regard to the existing
character:


 National Planning Policy Framework (December 2023)
 Policy D4 London Plan (March 2021)
 Policy CP3 of the Local Development Framework Core
     Strategy (July 2010)
 Policies BP8 and BP11 of the Local Development
     Framework Borough Wide Development Plan Document (March 2011)
 Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary
     Planning Document (February 2012)
 Policies SP2 and DMD6 of The London Borough of
     Barking and Dagenham’s Draft Local Plan: (Regulation 19 Submission
     Version, December 2021)
description: Construction of a first floor rear extension
